MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH20 postcode area of Loanhead, affecting properties in Mayburn Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.59AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8.57AM on 17 October 2020.
